Paragraph.Text: The mini hopper is a cheaper version of the standard storage hopper which can store 10 items and takes a couple of seconds to process each item. The mini hopper is suitable as an input hopper for the Central Power Hub, Pyrothermic Generator or other machine with a long processing time. You should look to upgrade mini hoppers if they become a bottleneck.
For more information on storage hoppers please refer to the standard storage hopper guide.
